text: @timthefruit @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland @ForestryComm @defra Can the huge reduction in monitoring of the health of such an important site (among many unmonitored SSSI's) really just be due to the steady defunding by our govt of @NaturalEngland I wonder?

@becclestown @KeasdenKate @RobGMacfarlane @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland Yes. And Police if there is reasonable evidence or suspicion that protected species have been affected (they uphold the W&C Act - custodial sentence possible).
